metadata.title: CVE-2015-8979 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the parsePresentationContext function instorescp in DICOM dcmtk-3.6.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (segmentation fault) via a long string sent to TCP port4242.

criterions.comment: dcmtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
